pardon my slightly irrelevant paragraph for this review but out of very strange consequences blizzard allowed valve to purchase this ip dota is what is potentially the most competitive gem of all time the known mod for warcraft 3 reign of choas or the frozen throne it is famous that it had no marketing no montization or any advertisements and grew its popularity in numbers for its strangely addictive gameplay and emphasis on teamwork considered to be called a ction real time strategy or massive online battle arena as a genre the legalities that were abound during the time the game was being made caused massive problems for valve i can sympathise with this blizzard had nearly sued valve such as keeping the ip not too close to the warcraft characters changing the azeroth world to the mad moon this meant changing names and lore such as necrolyte to necrophos skeleton king diablo to the wraith king and many others like obsidian destroyer to outworld devourer which the latter sounds much more frightening to avoid law suits just recently pudge has his damaged body sewed up because it was too similar to diablo 1s the butcher who was inspiration for pudge and his line ah fresh meat difficulty hardcore is tough for those new to this genre publisher valve producer valve special mentions eul creator abdul ismail icefrog guinusso factors introduction gameplay cooperationteamwork graphics features replay value audio introduction verdict dota 2 stands for defense of the ancients an assymetric map made by eul a modder of starcraft who started the mod off made headway for a guy called icefrog who helped eul port it to warcraft 3 and made it esports viable dota 2 features many rts inspired elements from warcraft and ability use multiple unit control is used throughout gameplay verdict the goal of this game is simple  destroy the enemies ancient  a building of pure immense power of both evil and good radiating from it launch attacks with friends or players on the other persons ancient in hope the destroy it to win the game while defending yours to aid you  you have heroes who will come to your aid when facing enemy heroes with each demise of creeps and hero gold is rewarded to get better items attack your own creeps to stop the enemy getting your gold commonly referred to as farming  engine is powered by valves source engine it provides the flexibility of modding d2warecom and steam workshop it is completely free to play and uses microtransitions and has a workshop for those interested for making items to be appoved and sold on the game itself aiding animators modellers and sound producers gain a slice of the profits about 1025% goes to them and even more if you donate directly this is assuringly one of the most competitive games you and i will experience even if you dont know me we will assuringly meet as allies or rivals >d you play in a team of five versus five as heroes special ability units which can cast spells and are controlled and gain levels and gold by killing creeps which contain gold and experience these creeps are noncontrollable unless you buy certain items like helm of the dominator or you are this guy called chen units which attack other units or youenemies as time progresses you can use this gold to purchase items which aid you against your enemy and makes you stronger and stronger dota 2 is very well kitted out with leauges clans tournaments cosemetics spectator mode downloadable replays a somewhat rudimentary report system and fantastic looking graphics that focus on fantasy very vivid and pyrotechnical the games mechanics are similar to those who play warcraft 3s version of this modification you are 3 main attributes called strength agility and intelligence strength focuses on being tanky meaning they take a lot of hits before dying and are relatively the first to be sent in while their team some strength heroes contain better stats or gain which makes them able to use their spells often most strength heroes focus on other strength heroes which are capable of dealing massive autoattack damage agility focuses on speed and movement which most heroes will have quite fast spell casts they have a high amount of options for escaping enemy heroes and usually have a form of invisibility or entrapment intelligence focuses on spammable as in can be done over and over again magic damage dealing spells which can silence disarm or drain the mana of an enemy intelligence have by far the most mana which is the bar like health which is used to cast spells which drains them requiring management intelligent heroes utilize strategy far better but become weaker at late game capable of burst damage on certain heroes like lion cooperationteamwork verdict cooperation in dota 2 is highly dependable on who you play with i recommend not playing with peers that do not know the support roles carry and semicarry roles will result in a less favorable outcome for the final stages of the game referred to as the late game i shouldnt really say this but prepare for a lot of russians pervuians and foreign folks in the wrong servers this is not a gripe i actually prefer multicultural lobbies graphics verdict source engine has been modified to present higher graphical fidelity including hbao a type of shader called horizon based ambient occulsion which makes the shading much more realistic and increased resolution on textures models and the animations are excellent dota 2 has its immersion split slightly with too much fog of war blackness border to hide sight from enemies that affects seeing enemy players i havent found a way to tone the fog of war to become more or less visible or to disable it not in the form of hacking but in the form of console commands and you still cannot see it features verdict download it and see for yourself very kitted out with tons of stuff to use too numerous to put here but it will appease and appeal to many replay value verdict each battle is dynamic and changes its course superb concept is that the trees surrounding the dota map allows for juking a form of evasion by confusing the enemy by moving into the fog or into a position which entraps them audio verdict soundtrack is nice mix of ochrestra and slow drum beats the music adapts to your teams aggression start pushing and the game starts to change to a heavy orchestra of war reviews may be updated to keep information accurate and preserve fact over opinion

recommended
the core mechanics of this game are fantastic and the diversity of gameplay is a strong selling point however it is a multiplayer game and the matchmaking is one of the worst i have ever come across it does not matter how long youve played or what level you are level is a good indicator of timeexperience you will be matched with complete noobs and elite players alike this is an attempt to balance the teams but all it does is create a scenario in which 95% or more no exaggeration of the games played are one sided stomps theres already been numerous complains about region locking i will not expand upon anything said by others it is a team game that requires communication and yes its difficult when a team mate does not speak the same language as you regardless of that language is not the main problem the main problem with dota 2 matchmaking is the enforced 50% winrate valve fanboys and other people will claim it does not exist but anybody who has played the game long enough knows otherwise it works by judging your skill level in one game and placing you with appropriate players in the next game if you do very well you may be matched with 4 very inexperienced players if you do poorly you may be matched with 4 very experienced players this wouldnt be a problem if dota 2 was not such a complicated game new players will be absolutely destroyed due to their lack of knowledge at the time of writing this i am level 50 in the game this has taken me over 1000 hours to achieve to put my next point in perspective as i said most games are onesided stomps and to prove this i usually check out the levels of every player before or after the game in games that i win my team usually consists of players lvl 50300 in games that i lose my team usually consists of players lvl 150 yes ive actually had a few games with lvl 1 players while i was lvl 30 when the total level of players on one team is hundreds higher than the other something is clearly wrong with the matchmaking system when one team has a few thousand more total hours played than the other something is clearly wrong with the matchmaking system playing well in one game will almost certainly cause you to lose the next game unless you are on what i like to call a valve permitted streak wherein the matchmaking decides to pair you with good players or awful players for a number of games in a row yes valve actually punishes players for doing too well and rewards players for losing too much a typical week of dota2 matches might look something like this wwwwwlwlwlwllllll repeating there can be longer or shorter streaks this is just an example this is not to alleviate myself or any player of fault everybody makes mistakes and we are not all professional players however when the teams are grossly imbalanced as explained above the fate of the match is decided before it even begins the reason i keep playing is those 5% of games where both teams are equally matched and the game is actually funchallenging winning a game in under 20min because the other team are mostly noobs not fun same goes for losing when its your turn on the noob team if valve ever fixed the matchmaking this game would be amazing both mechanically and socially that will probably never happen because dota2 has a lot of players and matchmaking isnt easy to begin with but please anything would be better than the 50% enforced winrate that is ruining my and many others desire to play this game if i know im going to losewin every game for the next 3 days why bother playing at all ps the community is notoriously toxic i would recommend avoiding if you have thin skin or get frustrated easily

dota 2 is a multiplayer online game in develop by valve corporation and the stand alone version of defense of the ancient mod on warcraft 3 reign of chaos and warcraft 3 the frozen throne  dota 2 officially announced on october 13 2010 at the time of people who can play dota 2 is limited only certain people are getting special rights of the developer and distributor dota 2 was not like other online games that bermode click and play dota 2 requires another program to be patchernya namely steam the purpose of dota 2 is destroying ancient opponents protected by other players here players will choose one of 98 heroes that exist each hero has different abilities and strengths this is what makes dota 2 stressful as a realtime strategy game players are required to be able to decide the action as soon as possible if you do not want to die or lose gameplay gameplay of dota 2 is a combination of realtime strategy with topdown perspective and also systemlevel and system equipment adapted from roleplaying game  the game is divided into two teams the radiant and the dire each team has a hero respectively with their respective strengths but the player can determine the game mode to be played so that the players can use the radiant team the hero of the dire team and vice versa players are required to quickly determine the action to be performed when pressed otherwise the player will die and will provide benefits to the hero who killed him the more kills the player is getting rich and vice versa the more killed players will lack the gold so it can not upgrade the item itself dota 2 is a team game not a solo game because if you want to solo do not play dota go play chess therefore its useless if only one hero who has a hero equip decent but the other does not the team will definitely lose this game teaches us that we can not stand alone without the help of others especially the help from our friends players type server dota 2 in southeast asia people are always calling other people as pinoy pinoy is slang for the philippines for unknown reasons why if you have people like this in the game so if something goes wrong then you will be called pinoy by this person no matter where you come from countries such as indonesia malaysia or singapore you will still be called pinoy such people will assume pinoy is a person who can not play the game without seeing meraka national origin people who are considered by the other players as pinoy it does not matter if youre filipino or not if you make a mistake then you will automatically be pinoy this may not be too offended if the person who made a mistake is the philippines although the philippines has a bad reputation in dota 2 but not all filipinos will admit it filipino nationalists are people who if they were heckled by pinoy call then they will become more aggressive so i think you should focus on their mistakes rather than calling him pinoy people who do crowing bottle selfishly until the end of the game bottle crowing is a technique used to increase the survivability especially in the middle lane and it was fine that is not cool is to do it at the extreme stage do you have to be selfish bottle crowing from the beginning to the end of the game why although the role of support you are you realize that i also need a courier for example for the wards do you realize that there are 4 other people who also need their items if you make the team overwhelmed just because you need a bottle crowing to survive until the end of the game then i think you should review again the way you play this game people from europe or north america who complain about lag no such thing as dedicated servers i know it but sooner or later you will meet the person who decided to play the game on the server that is located in another part of the earth it is not wrong because the rules do not prohibit it i even tried to queuing at the european servers to play with friends there but if you experience lag during play because choosing a server far away there then stop complaining or worse pause hoping lagnya lost people who pretend to be someone singapore or malaysia with the purpose of pretending to be a person of singapore or malaysia people like this will continue to add le or la every time he says something and i mean absolutely everything top la b la nice la ggwp la how do i know that there are people who pretend to be like this because i know some of them why do they do it i do not know for sure if they want to retrace the footsteps of daryl iceiceice cai yee koh or mushi then they need to be more than just wearing this access people pinoy im actually not sure whether to be a player from the philippines could fall into this category but if you think about it i have never heard of the other players in southeast asia servers invoked with the country of origin besides pinoy this may be because the pinoy has a way of unique in the play and act in pubs it all comes back to you to consider whether the pinoy is a bad player or not but the bright side is they are quite creative in play dota they just need guidance in the right direction and sometimes a reality punch when pinoypride syndrome relapse pinoy doto best doto this review translatable in google translate

overview i would like to start by recommending this game i think everyone should try this game for at least a game or two online before deveoping opinions for this game next i would say that dota 2s not easy to get into i admit but once you start to do well on your own you feel like youve actually acomplished something and that in itself makes you continue playing also i will use some terms you may not be familiar with itll take too long to explain them so find out for yourself gameplaygame mechanics dota 2 has one of the largest learning curves i have ever encountered ive played may games before which i was able to pick up pretty easily but dotas curve is disgustingly huge i have friends who have played lol for quite a long time  so theyre familiar with how mobas work  but when i introduced them to dota they honestly didnt know what was going on im not being rude to lol or the community but thats just how it was from a basic level there is as much going on in dota compared to any other moba however when looking how the game mechanics work one can see that there is a lot more the more notable game mechanics are denying destructible trees evnironement day and night cycle and highground and lowground i wont go into any detail with them but just those mechanics are enough to separate dota from the other mobas with 108 heroes and counting in the total hero pool there is so much veriety to pick from all heroes are unlocked straight away which i consider better than having to unlock heroes after playing for a certain time others may disagree with this saying that you work towards something when trying to unlock heroes but i say being able to handle the difficulty of certain heroes is when you feel a sense of achievement plus other mobas can just buy the locked heroes which defeats the whole point of that argument heroes like meepo rubick invoker earth spirit require considerable skill to be able to play which you work towards by playing other heroes first in the buildup gameplay itself will go from fastpaced action in teamfights  to slow cautious waiting sometimes strategic waiting sometimes not waiting for the next pickoff or teamfight without being too reckless games can be as short as 20 minutes thats quick in this genre to as long as a whole hour sometimes games can extend to over 1 12 hours just because its a stalemate because of this excitement will be a rollercoaster it can be extremely fun or painfully boring though the lows shouldnt put you off can a game really be fun all the time a major patch gets released every season or so which contains massive balance changes alterations to gameplay and possibly a new hero this way gameplay barely becomes stale and provides you with a reason to logon to steam and launch dota 2 when you are bored there is one problem when getting into this game the tutorial at best itll teach the basic mechanics of this game at best the game will force you to play the tutorial depending on what options you choose when the game first asks you if you have any experience with the genre oh god the tutorial is so boring that it cany throw you off playing completely not only that it doesnt represent the actual game until you play a limited heroes game against bots and even that can be mindnumbing because youre not playing against real people when the fun starts if you take this review to mind when you start playing please endure the tutorial until you actually play online withagainst real players matchmaking matchmaking has been improved over time with more language preferences and stricter rule on bad conduct matchmaking is very slowly reaching the point where you will search for a game and actually find people with similar experience to youyour party whom also speak the same language and have relatively low ping however this does not stop people from other countries who do not speak english search with english checked as a language preference and europe west as their their desired server what im tring to say is that russians queue on english speaking servers when they cant even speak english i would have no problem if they do actually speak english and if they werent so foul mouthed but when i have no idea what they are saying it really hinders teamwork a couple of russians explained why they search on eu west servers because the ping was lower thats fair enough i dont mind that they speak english but for those who dont they cant seem to turn off the english language preference if they turn off the preference and search on eu west theyll be matched with other russianspeaking players problem solved no players many players will cooperate when playing as it is a team game however many will not this game is so diverse that everyone has therr own way of playing it which can sometimes conflict with how you want to play dont be surprised when you somehow end up in an argument with a stranger just because they disagree with the slightest thing you think about a game which has no impact on your life whatsoever those of you may be thinking that will never happen to me111 xd youre wrong your online numeric skill matchmaking rating mmr will determine the likelyhood of you running into these people higher  less likely lower  more likely note mmr is independent between ranked and nonranked when getting your ranked mmr it uses you invisible nonranked mmr but after the first game they become seperate values community the dota community is mixed between people like me who want to happily play the game and trolls i understand that there will be trolls in every community but its quite severe in this one its not that they are the majority infact quite the opposite but they do stain the community the colour of cancer yellowgreen which as a whole may ruin the experience for some by playing dota 2 you automatically become part of its community you you either make the most of it or gtfo one positive thing about the community is that its filled with amazing designers who frequently submit there work may it be cosemtics or art to the steam community page and on websites like reddit this game actually provides revenue to designers who get there work added ingame and the community get a say into what gets added also the community is generally helpful when you need it making guidesbuilds answering peoples questions spamming rvolvo around diretide cancelled last year c  so be sure to count on people when you need the extra support [h1]final notes[h1] overall dota 2 is a really good game my game time speaks for itself but its no where near perfect the whole game is a rollercoaster  with so many highs and numerous lows  its a game you would have to experience yourself please do not lauch it with the attitude ive played other mobas it will be the same becuase youll be caught offguard good luck and have fun ratings gameplay game mechanics matchmaking sense of achievement hats community players matchmaking learning curve tutorial depends on your mmr matchmaking will put you with other people with similar skill and experience to you but there isnt a working filter for people who dont speak your desired language 910 when you really get into it 710 any casual dota player there is no such thing as a casual dota player 510 if you never have a good game note 34your score if youre antisocial and play without friends note 12your score if you cant stand the community but still want to play other review 1010 would feed again

dota is a strategy game about choices who to pick what to buy who to kill where to defend what to do and you do all of this within a 2060 minute session depending on how well or poorly youve chosen but even in overwhelming odds theres still a chance to make a comeback if you play it right and capitalize on mistakes this keeps the games tense and exciting it takes hundreds of hours to learn the details of the game mechanics thousands to master them the premise is simple and tutorials guide you through it explaining it in a reviewrecommendation isnt going to help you more than experiencing it would so telling you just to play it is the best thing to do dota is time well spent and item drops can make it worthwhile for your steam wallet check the market items theres no reason not to find out what the buzz is all about just remember that 100 hours is about the time itll take you to learn the basics comfortably its similar with counter strike where thats around the time when you learn its not codbf so try not to say its too complicated before that point or youre going to miss out on your new favorite game

well i decided to do this review again after playing it a bit more and trying to do a good review to get things started i will go ahead and name the categories i am basing my review on lore gameplay community and the overall judgement lore when i am talking about lore i mean development and actual game lore the development lore is that there once was a game called warcraft 3 which was a very good rts game soon an expansion pack came this expansion gave way to a modder that would create defence of the ancients the mod took over the warcraft community like a wild fire and got popular the way the mod was played was similar to that of a star craft map type soon this mod took its own community that would balance out the characters and give voting on new characters that are known as heroes soon the reign were handed over and over and over again to different people until it was handed to a person whose username is icefrog icefrog is still the current owner of the original dota mod the original mod makers went on to make the other games in the arts yes that is the genre name not moba genre such as lol and hon icefrog was approached by valve to making a sequel with a full team icefrog agreed and here we are now actual game lore the lore of this game is quite deceptive each of the characters has their own backstory and most of them dont seem intertwined but when you read them carefully you can see the connections but the centralised lore is that two beings fought each other until they were casted into a rock floating into space orbiting a planet to that planet the rock would be known as the mad moon the two beings cracked out of the rock but pieces of it scattered all over the planet making the inhabitants grow strange power they felt allegiance to the rock that gave them power and they decided to destroy the other rock the war of the ancients has begun rating it has a solid lore if you have the time to make the connections yourself it is quite a good read for some anyway 455 gameplay with the war of the ancients the goal of each match is to destroy the others ancient seems simple right wrong on so many levels the gameplay videos by the pros make it look extra deceiving by making it look like attack tower until it falls then run back kill some enemies etc etc however there is quite a lot of strategy when it comes to it even the before the match begins there is strategy dota to me is like an advanced game of rockpaperscissors if it had over one hundred and thirty different options to choose from one character counters this one but at the same time this one counters this and so forth so when the game actually starts roles start coming into play i am not going to list every role just some key ones carry your bulldozer your team fight winner your you get the idea these guys can turn the tide of battle quite easily if they get a good early game they suck early but get better and better as the game progresses support these guys keep your carry alive and well for them to start owning the other team usually these guys have high damage nukes that can decimate the enemy carry jungler these guys can be both of the above roles depends on what their strength is so that is just the picking phase everything in it has a strategy your items choice your lane the map is split in three different lanes and hell even the place you stand determines how a battle will play out sure there are varying degrees of difficulty between heroes and their roles and game style change between each other but the phrase of dota still stands getting the basics is not the problem it is climbing the hill of experience so in a nutshell this game will provide great experience for those looking for a challenge 55 community if there was a breaking point for game it is its community let me just say this all arts communities are crap absolute crap there are your ragers elitists noobs dumb arses whiny kids etc this community has a lot to offer i will not deny that parts of the community are creative and friendly as hell however the general community is absolute scum one little mistake could set them off that is in the regular match making let alone lpq low priority queue aka the  pool all in all the community does have its diamonds but it is mostly  25 over all opinion great game play interesting lore but semi hole of a community 11515

dota 2 is a similar game to league of legends with some differences that make both of them unique like how you can get couriers and have access to secret shops in dota while in lol there are summoner spells and masteries however this is a review about dota and what the game is about not a comparison about these 2 games dota is a moba game multiplayer online battle arena in which you are place in a team of 5 players to go against another team of 5 players with one main object which is to obliterate the enemies towers barracks and finally their ancient all of you start at level 1 and all of you have to destroy anything in your path while trying to not have any casualties along the way since the enemy who just killed you will gain lots of exp as well as some gold as simple as it looks its not as that there are many ways that your opponent can stop you from progressing like the occasional ganks that happen from time to time aside from the basics of dota the game is really fununless theres that sshole thatll keep calling you a noob or if theres that player that dies intentionally but other then that the graphics are good controls are easy and overall the gameplay is great so go on and download dota and have fun

rules and guidelines for steam discussions reviews and user generated content these guidelines apply to all places in the steam store and community where users can post content this includes but is not limited to discussions comments guides product reviews screenshots artwork videos tags steam workshop and steam greenlight when providing feedback posting information or discussing a product in steam whether its negative or positive please make sure you are being relevant constructive and polite developers take feedback from all kinds of sources into account even though they may not have the time to respond to every post or question please note that administratorsmoderators reserve the right to changeeditdeletemovemerge any content at any time if they feel it is inappropriate abusive or incorrectly categorized all users are subject to the steam subscriber agreement and steam online conduct

dota 2 can be a very hard game to get into as the skill ceiling is incredibly high in essence the game is a 5v5 were you divide your team between 3 lanes and a possible jungle winning requires a combination of good team mates knowledge of the game and its mechanics and a healthy dose of luck the community for dota can be very toxic at times and most people will not hesitate to tell you what you have done wrong and how they are amazing players but if you can push past that the game is a lot of fun to get into trying new builds and tactics and if you get can get a group of friends to remove the chance of getting any random players then its all the better if you do not know how the game works id suggest watching a few videos and reading some guides to make your first few games less painful the guide i would suggest is httpwwwpurgegamerscomwelcometodotayousuck he does a great job of explaining everything you need to know and has a video archive of himself playing and improving on heros as i say the game can be hard to get into but if you can push past the ability requirements and the occasional  on your team you will not regret spending the next 23 thousand hours kicking

as you begin to play this gameyoure given a tutorial on how the gameplay works as you finish completing the tutorial you would have options to either play with bots or with online players there is a wide variety of modes to choose from all of the heroes are unlocked from the start so you dont have to unlock them one by one like any other moba game each heroes have their own specific roles so choose wisely and dont anyhow go whatever you feel like there is no ingame money in this game and you earned different rewards as you play many matches there is a lore for you to read for each character if youre interested however these game have a steep leaning curve and those who are new to moba genre will struggle how the gameplay system work it require a lot of tactics & teamwork in order to win a matchthat is if your partner will listen to you cause a lot of player i found will quickly rage at you if you make a minor issue while some other just rage quit because they felt like they cannot make a comeback a lot of heroes are memorable mainly because sometimes you would see those heroes interact with one another depending if they are rival or allied

dota 2 is one of the most anticipated game that every player has been waiting for and its been a year has past since this game has been released after the test but now let me review this game with the exception of the graphics gameplay the gameplay is kinda sluggish at times especially if your internet has a very low signal but lets face it even though the game is bad sometimes due to your slow connection it can still carries some of the game if the net returns to its original state but if you have a very tough time fighting with the connection until you got the highest ping point for those who didnt know a kind of signal detector use to check the signal if the ping is too high lag can occur and can result a very bad reputation to your signal and if the ping is too low no lags can occur and the gameplay runs smoothly a disconnection will occur and it will gave you a low priority to your gaming record it is indeed bad though but if you have a good to better connection the game can responds the latest gameplay itself but watch out if your opponents hero kills your hero due to your slow web connection it can make you frustrating so fix your internet connection right away already overated and boring to me final review the game is a must play to all dota gamers but its up to you if the game is kinda sick or totally repetative its your decision but for me i like how this game works and it introuduces some of its core of the game so my final verdict for this game dota 2 is a 710 it a great game but if they do some adjustment for some dota newbies at the community booth ive played dota on and off since the map mod in warcraft iii and if theres a game i find myself always coming back to its dota you just cant beat the variety of play theres a lot of strategy and lots to think about in real time theres over 100 heroes each hero has unique abilities each hero can have numerous item builds lots of possibilities here the other thing that keeps my attention is i can have a full game start to finish often in under 1 hour you know youll either win or lose in the next hour and the tides can turn at any point ive had games where we destroyed the other teams ancients defense towers and barracks causing the mega creep spawns only to have them come back and win the game dota is a game that requires some time spent learning to play before you can really appreciate it but its worth the investment its a nice jump in jump out game that you can play with friends often only waiting in queue a minute or two between matches valve really maintained the original feel that i remember and continue to provide regular updates a big plus is that i havent seen any cheating which is rare these days for online games and this game is free

dota 2 is one of my favourite games to date why im not sure is it the compelling nature to work as a team the thrill of a victory of the satisfaction of a great gank either way if my play time is to go by anything and its only around a modest 200 hours dota 2 is an engaging and addictive game for anyone that likes teamwork and a tactical moba the graphics are quite decent the sound and character design are solid and the gameplay mechanics fluid best of all its 100% free w the addition of microtransactions to bling out your hero however it can be rage inducing when things arent going your way which can be quite common this usually takes form of players disconnecting or generally being a little stupid ie running into pinch zones but never fear sometimes its all about getting the most enjoyable experience out of a loss you can get that moment the most stupid death becomes the funniest thing youve seen all day to some it might not be a comical death and that is expected when younger players arent quite sure on whats happening but they will soon learn hopefully in addition dota 2 is a free russian speaking class overall dota 2 is a solid moba with great mechanics a wonderful player base and glorious moments 910 would bang

for my friends who have not touched this game whether they have heard its  garbage or simply because they just arent interested this review is for you dota 2 is a game of strategy coordination and combat all wrapped up in a letter stating take the enemys ancient before they take yours in this game you and 4 other players choose from over 100 heroes in order to complete the objective while the enemy team does the same each hero is unique and have their strengths and weaknesses after heroes there are another 100 items availible for your heroes to purchase ingame these items can strengthen your hero weaken enemy heroes or provide some kind of utility with such a combination of heroes and items dota expands from what on paper looks like a race into an infinite universe of tactics and teamplay in order to complete that seemingly simple objective  this game is complex you will not understand how the game works on your first try nobody does rather this game is based mainly on knowledge and on the abilty for a team to coorordinate with eachother so as you play research experiment watch others you will grow stronger hell ive spent over 1700 hours playing this game as of writing this review and i still learn i still can improve and i still question i could tell you in depth in how the game works but this is a review not a beginers guide if you are interested i have pasted two links containing guides on dota httpwwwpurgegamerscomwelcometodotayousuckuoqbsoikrie really good explanation of dota really helps a begginer put things into perspective httptwopnavigamingcomendota_2 this contains many guides on mechanics in dota

ive played dota 2 since the 3rd quarter of 2012 so ive had it for 2 14 years thats 19710 hours now lets assume youre supposed to have 8 hours of sleep every day so ive been awake supposedly for 13140 hours of that time now further lets assume you go to full time education like i did and spend approximately 4 hours a day in schooluniversity on average that leaves you with 9855 hours so ive had 9855 hours of spare time in the last 2 and a bit years to study get fit get a girlfriend find a job and get successful and this time also includes eating time and laying around doing nothingwatching tv time ive spent 13 of my time playing dota 2 is it an amazing game absolutely if i could go back and decide whether to start playing it hell no about 3k hours in dota 2 and probably about 15k hours in dota if i had done anything productive during that 45k hours i would be pretty rich or happy with my self by now but instead im fat and have no job and got horrible grades in uni so far now that was the disclaimer time to rate the game out of 10 for graphics gameplay storyline replayability and then an overall score mobas are not usually played for graphics so much the main focus of the game is on the actual gameplay but in comparison to the other big moba games dota 2 has quite good graphics if youre looking for a visually amazing game you can spend time on dota 2 might not be the best choice because its not really made for the graphics if you want a moba with good graphics look at smite dawngate or heroes of the storm none of which ive played but their screenshots look like they have slightly better graphics than dota 2 also dota 2 has a few female characters but if your in it for the revealing type images of characters go play league of legends because youre probably gonna never load into a game without seeing bewbs graphics score 710 gameplay dota 2 has amazing gameplay after playing so many times i still feel like theres ever so little more i need to know because gameplay is changed slightly or sometimes vastly by patches the patches are seeming to come more regularly now 2 months in a row with 1 patch per month the skills a dota 2 player needs to learn to be really great can take years and years to get good at reaction time isnt the only important thing but strategy and calculations are important in comparison to lol which is the only other moba i have played dota 2 has significantly more strategy involved in pub games i play lol game where people barely speak or plan out whats going on in dota 2 there are so many tense occasions where you and your team have to roam the map and farm in a group and avoid smoke ganks other gameplay factors which enhance skill required is the timer system of jungle spawns stacking pulling creep blocking denying allied creeps and heroes in some cases and the last most important thing is that whereas in lol where a majority of heroes can solo kill others you need to organise ganks very well with allies to get kills dota 2 takes a while to learn but the satisfaction is everpresent once youve gotten to a certain point gamplay score 1010 storyline the lore in dota was nice to learn about the dota 2 lore is pretty bad and not really linked to the original game valve doesnt release any storyline related videos for dota 2 really the advantage of this is that since the game has source film maker with it i havent used sfm yet a lot of talented people have created sfm videos on youtube which are really enjoyable to watch having said that if you want a game for its story i would not recommend dota 2 for that compared to games like smite and lol the character backgrounds arent really important and many including myself cant be bothered reading the only story in the game is kind of a tutorial form which is nice for new players storyline score 410 replayability this is self explanatory i have spent 45k hour around for this game and dota it is probably one of the most replayable games ever made you will almost never have 2 games with the exact same heroes and team unless maybe in captains mode where you can ban and pick and games can last between 10 mins and 1 and a half hours some are faster or longer but this is the general sweet spot with the average nonabandoned game lasting about 40ish mins replayability score 1010 overall dota 2 lacks a little bit in the story area but this game was not meant for that this game was made for literally endless fun and playing this overall score will not be an average of the other scores but more of the total enjoyability of the game ive been hooked on for the last 7 years overall score 9510 not 1010 because that would imply that its the most perfect game ever created which i still think it could be a little bit better

recommended
dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena game in a threedimensional environment presented from an oblique highangle perspective the player commands one of 109 controllable character heroes each hero begins the match at level one and becomes more powerful by accumulating experience points through combat thereby leveling up to the maximum level of twentyfive with every level gained the player either selects a new ability for their hero to learn or enhance their general statistics each heros method of combat is influenced by its primary property strength agility or intelligence dota 2 features items which the player stores in an inventory these items are acquired predominantly through purchase with gold the ingame currency items vary in function some enhance the statistics of a hero while others grant additional abilities the player automatically receives small increments of gold continuously though they can obtain more by destroying enemies killing nonplayer characters grants gold only to the player who lands the final blow whereas killing enemy heroes grants gold to the players nearby allies as well destroying towers or killing roshan gives gold to all players on the team denying is a feature of the game where players inhibit the enemys ability to accumulate gold and experience by killing an allied unit or destroying an allied structure before the enemy can do so each match of dota 2 takes place on a functionally symmetrical map that features the strongholds of two warring factions the radiant and the dire the radiant is based at the southwest corner of the map while the dire is based at the northeast corner the two sides are divided by a river that runs perpendicular to the central lane these factions are defended by up to five players in each stronghold is a critical structure called the ancient a fountain that provide health and lesser structures these bases are connected by three paths referred to as lanestwo run alongside the edges of the map while one runs directly between the two bases the lanes are guarded by defensive towers as well as autonomous characters called creeps which periodically spawn in groups and travel along the lanes attacking enemies they encounterfeatured across the map are hostile characters referred to as neutrals which are not aligned to either faction and are primarily located in the forests located in a tarn on the northeast side of the river is a boss called roshan who typically requires multiple team members to kill and drops powerful items dota 2 features seasonal events which provide players with the option of playing the game with special game modes that alter the aesthetics and objectives with the seasonal event game modes the central focus of the game shifts away from the standard battle composition in order to focus on new objectives central to the seasonal events so far there have been three seasonal events the halloweenthemed diretide event the christmasthemed frostivus event and the new bloom festival which celebrates the coming of spring

dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena game in a threedimensional environment presented from an oblique highangle perspective the player commands one of 109 controllable character heroes each hero begins the match at level one and becomes more powerful by accumulating experience points through combat thereby leveling up to the maximum level of twentyfive with every level gained the player either selects a new ability for their hero to learn or enhance their general statistics each heros method of combat is influenced by its primary property strength agility or intelligence dota 2 features items which the player stores in an inventory these items are acquired predominantly through purchase with gold the ingame currency items vary in function some enhance the statistics of a hero while others grant additional abilities the player automatically receives small increments of gold continuously though they can obtain more by destroying enemies killing nonplayer characters grants gold only to the player who lands the final blow whereas killing enemy heroes grants gold to the players nearby allies as well destroying towers or killing roshan gives gold to all players on the team denying is a feature of the game where players inhibit the enemys ability to accumulate gold and experience by killing an allied unit or destroying an allied structure before the enemy can do so each match of dota 2 takes place on a functionally symmetrical map that features the strongholds of two warring factions the radiant and the dire the radiant is based at the southwest corner of the map while the dire is based at the northeast corner the two sides are divided by a river that runs perpendicular to the central lane these factions are defended by up to five players in each stronghold is a critical structure called the ancient a fountain that provide health and lesser structures these bases are connected by three paths referred to as lanestwo run alongside the edges of the map while one runs directly between the two bases the lanes are guarded by defensive towers as well as autonomous characters called creeps which periodically spawn in groups and travel along the lanes attacking enemies they encounter featured across the map are hostile characters referred to as neutrals which are not aligned to either faction and are primarily located in the forests located in a tarn on the northeast side of the river is a boss called roshan who typically requires multiple team members to kill and drops powerful items dota 2 features seasonal events which provide players with the option of playing the game with special game modes that alter the aesthetics and objectives with the seasonal event game modes the central focus of the game shifts away from the standard battle composition in order to focus on new objectives central to the seasonal events so far there have been three seasonal events the halloweenthemed diretide event the christmasthemed frostivus event and the new bloom festival which celebrates the coming of spring

dota 2 like all the other mobas are hard to review mainly because the community the game itself is pretty smooth and really likeable there are tons of characters right at the beginning with plenty of builds for each one a huge point is the ingame build seeker where you can apply a selected build for your character and after that point the game will suggest which skill must leveling and which item need to buy to be succes its a must feature have for newcomers wait there is more after all match the system will give presents to the players however mostly these are just cosmetics for the characters but with that you can customize the look of your favorite dude and top of that if you dont need these items you can sell it on the market the replay tool is also a nice touch and now comes the dark side no matter how good is the game when the playmates ruins it for me its really hard to get a good team in pub mainly because i play on euwest and well hmpf so we have a hard time with the ukrainians  its far more better if you gather 4 of your friends and play together other than that if i just compare the game itself with other mobas i cant anything say this is the best 8510

uh not too sure what to write here so heres a recipe for pancakes instead ingredients 1 12 cups allpurpose flour 3 tablespoons sugar 1 tablespoon baking powder 14 teaspoon salt 18 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg 2 large eggs at room temperature 1 14 cups milk at room temperature 12 teaspoon pure vanilla extract 3 tablespoons unsalted butter plus more as needed now to make it 1 in a large bowl whisk together the flour sugar baking powder salt and nutmeg 2 in another bowl beat the eggs and then whisk in the milk and vanilla 3 melt the butter in a large cast iron skillet or griddle over medium heat 4 whisk the butter into the milk mixture add the wet ingredients to the flour mixture and whisk until a thick batter is just formed 5 keeping the skillet at medium heat ladle about 14 cup of the batter onto the skillet to make a pancake make 1 or 2 more pancakes taking care to keep them evenly spaced apart cook until bubbles break the surface of the pancakes and the undersides are golden brown about 2 minutes flip with a spatula and cook about 1 minute more on the second side serve immediately or transfer to a platter and cover loosely with foil to keep warm repeat with the remaining batter adding more butter to the skillet as needed 6 procedure for adding fruit to pancakes once the bubbles break the surface of the pancakes scatter the surface with sliced or diced fruit or chocolate chips nuts etc flip with a spatula and cook for 1 minute more being careful not to burn toppings nah great game highly recomended

dota is a great cooperation game that has the goal to destroy the opposing teams ancient to win however it has many game modes that are fun to play it may be the same map all the time but it never gets boring this game also has many systems so new players can get used to it quite fast however this game has disadvantages as well like bad lobbys because of communication shortages  european guys who cant speak english guys who are selfish and just care to win so they just dont care about communication or they may even play with friends in the lobby but they are using the skype exuse all the time and they are so bored to press a single button so everyone in the team can communicate basically the only negative is that there is quite often communication problems among the teams and that some players do care about victory but just play oneman army style  picking their tank character and just do kills and show off one big advantage is that the game has no cheats in any lobby it may have huge disadvantages but the correct lobby and the gameplay can cover the disadvantages often  so i would say that it is a very good game to play that can never get boring even if its free

hey you yeah you dont have the brain capacity to control a massive army build bases and execute daring army battles even though this games mechanics were taken from realtimestrategy games and do you enjoy blaming teammates rather than doing something about it when youre losing do you enjoy picking characters who only need rightclickscarries to function do you say we no def when youre losing even though the game is called defense of the ancients then if so you hypocritical basterd this game is meant for you expect your first matches to be full of carries and practically no support plays at all but who cares youre having fun losing be careful though young warrior matches can be full of people complaining about your play or the items you buy dont worry theyre just jealous of your feedi i mean killing streak so what if they call a  play or a wrong item on you if youre getting killz then its all fine theyre just jelly that you found a secret new meta before they could so what if you play a support hero and they complain when you last hit not your fault my brotha theyre just too slow to react so what if youre a support hero and not buy wards those wards are expensive as shet if they want all the farm while you just stand there and then expect you to buy wards then they are  as  how can you possibly buy wards when you dont have any gold bunch of  amirite youll notice in your first games that people like to kill other people well thats normal people do that in real life but you must remember this golden rule always push kid no matter how many times you pawn their noob arses you cant win if you can destroy the ancient this game is not won by kills but by pushing for example there is an impending 5 on 5 brawl or clash as they call it but as your teammates prepare for bloodshed you notice at the other side of the map a pack of allied mindless soldiers or creeps as they call it slowly march towards an enemy tower this is the perfect situation to push because the enemy heroes are way too far to respond to their tower being pushed so what do you do ditch your teammates and head for that tower wait until they have started fighting and then you push with the enemy team busy slaying your outnumbered teammates youre free to burn that tower down to the ground results a bounty of gold and a pushed tower your teammates can complain all they want about you leaving them in fact they should be thanking you for giving them the tower bounty ungrateful s if somehow you managed to get to their 3rd tower youll notice that behind it are two buildings these two buildings spawn the mindless creeps unless you destroy the 3rd tower these buildings are invulnerable meaning they cant be ed with if you destroy the 3rd tower then they are stripped of their godlike armor and now are ok to  with pro tip destroy the melee barracks first why because destroying it somehow gives your melee creeps steroids and since the melee creeps are the most produced creeps giving them steroids is the most rewarding effect and also the building somehow has a regeneration effect meaning it will heal itself so if youre going to attack it might as well kill it or youll be forced to retreat and watch it heal which leaves you as to how is it able to heal itself if its just a building how because fck logic thats why and if you manage to destroy all of the enemys barracks then the ingame announcer will shout mega creeps signifying that all of the allied creeps have steroids at that point you can pretty much let the creeps swarm the enemy i mean why not you fought your  out the whole match and had to deal with the enemys at so why not let them have a slow and painful death sounds good doesnt it and if youre lucky you might witness an enemy hero get killed by being swarmed by your steroid creeps fun aint it when picking a hero dont be that guy who picks first and if youre notoriously unlucky dont bother to random a hero yes it does give extra starting gold if you do but youll just end up giving it to the enemy as you feed let the others pick first take your time this is the part of the game where you actually use the most of your mind with analyze be considerate and choose a hero who can both counter the enemy picks and complement your allied picks now that youve pick a hero its time for the laning phase if youre support then they will need wards and wards need gold to possess so what do you do go to mid lane why so you can last hit without any teammate hogging all the farm if youre carry then they will need you to get lots of exp and gold so what do you do go to mid lane if youre an offlaner then you need farm to get utility skills and items so what do you do go to mid lane if youre tank then they need you to get tanky items and lots of exp to get stronger so what do you do go to mid lane in fact any hero you choose is a prime choice for mid lane remember first come gets the lane but anyways this game is quite addictive and may ruin your social life if you even had one friends family love ones all seem insignificant when youre in a match if youre still in school study time may become dota time and if youre working well you know whats going to happen overall this game has achieved what all games should achieve making you play and enjoy this game so yes i recommend this game good day to you sir

dota 2 defense of the ancients 2 is one of the best mobas multiplayer online battle arena  where the objective is to competitvely push lanes and destroy enemy towers to eventually reach their base first one to take down the enemys ancient final large building wins and one of the most popular second only to league of legends it is very similar to lol although there is no surrender feature in normal games  yet and if you play lol or most other mobas i can guarantee youll have a good time in dota 2 provided you can get over the difficulty the difficulty in dota 2 is much higher than other games of the same genre league can be quite easy but dota is a complete other world where if you dont do even the smallest split second thinking right it can cost an entire teamfight and then lead to defeat dont let this scare you though practising against bots will allow you to get ability and item combinations down pat although if youve never played a moba before it may take a while to learn as wellknown dota 2 player purge says it will take about 23 months before youd be considered ok or decent along side this difficulty in game is the players sometimes youll get really nice players that joke around a bit sometimes youll get nice competitive players sometimes youll get people who joke around the entire game to annoy their teambut sometimes youll get players who want nothing but perfection i myself at times may be one of these people and detriment their own team if the smallest thing isnt done correctly there is a reason behind this which is like ive meantioned before even the slightest wrongdoing tower diving for a kill aka suiciding  but this is quite a large example the heroes not champions you get to play as are all given to you at the start rather than buying or unlocking them although this may seem like all the new players would get to play the best heroes from the start there isnt exactly a best hero heroes have many many downsides and weaknesses and if not played well can lead to some of those problems ive mentioned above once a hero is learnt to play well though it is possible to effectively dominate the enemy team when playing on pubs casual servers beware when going into ranked matches though  most people in ranked will know how to play and what to do as it requires a fair amount of playing to unlock ranked i myself unlocked it in 120 games which was for me 240 hours of playing the game overall this is a great freetoplay game that is definitely worth getting its free after all and it isnt a small game unlike some f2p games that have next to no content or games that need to have most of the content bought to be able to use it and actually have fun in the game it isnt paytoplay in the slightest as the only thing money can buy is extra a good twist on a mmo mostly focused on strategy this game is playable by a wide range of players due to its different playing style for each character whether you are a supporter role for a team or the leader or the pusher all of them offer unique gameplay styles the objective though rather simple is rather hard to achieve in fact and can lead you to racking your brains to think of the best way to destroy the enemies base this game forges camarderie among players as each player in the team have to work with each other and support each other with the different skillsets they each have i strongly recommend you trying this game for a classic game twisted into something fresh and renewed its worth a try and most certainly will find a playing style in there to suit you

valve distributes pillbox model freetoplay that is to try his hand in the game is completely free commercial developers interest is primarily due to the operation of the gaming market for buying and selling a variety of accessories for the characters occasionally cosmetic bun drop at the end of the match for free much more often players get chests with hidden treasures the key to which you can buy in the store dota 2 decoration characters  a purely personal matter buying things does not affect the balance sheet so that in general all the charm of bunkers are available to everyone investments do not open new gameplay possibilities as is done for example in the league of legends ultimately the outcome of the match is always open to the professional level player if someone is not familiar with the concept of dota briefly sketch it the teams of light and darkness task is to destroy the enemy base the composition of each party consists of five characters one of which management is performed by the player also they are involved in a battle creeps  weak units follows a simple algorithm to go on a given route and kill oncoming enemies for the destruction of heroes and creeps players get money and experience who spend on the development of his character it is here that concluded the full potential of bunkers heroes in the game for more than a hundred for the successful outcome of the match is not enough to choose a character you liked visually proven in one battle hero can be completely useless in another everything from the choice of the ward to set items purchased must assume the existence of a comprehensive plan for the match any action requires serious analysis of the situation during the game every decision is situational and success depends entirely on your ability to correctly calculate the potential opponent to see major trumps his team peak and predict the course of battles the longer you play the more opportunities disclosed over time you realize that bunker implies a simple but brilliant concept dota 2 seven one waiting and very often do not wait plot as such in dota 2 no some eventbackground is rooted in the world of warcraft 3 only thing that can amuse themselves histories lovers  small biographical summary for each of the characters however the knowledge of these facts does not affect the gameplay change the wallpaper the concept map heroes  all migrated to the dota 2 is almost unchanged yes and what changes can we talk on the bunkers the structure of the gameplay is strictly defined and any attempt to bring conceptual innovation is fraught with loss of balance mindful of the fact that the cart does not need a fifth wheel valve neatly confined to some cosmetic innovations first dota 2 as an independent project has got a stylish menu that offers quick access to the game itself store news as well as the creation of guides and translations professional matches all the opportunities provided by the developers organized very convenient greatly reducing the barrier to entry for newcomers for them the same way a special education campaigns where they can without spoiling the old residents of the nerves to master the basic principles of playing different characters after that  welcome to the expanses of the team battles at the moment there are seven game modes in which the differences relate solely homepage of the match  the choice of heroes for those who simply want to have fun and hone their management skills specific character fit popular all pick for daughtery with professional ambitions preferable captains mode in which more tactical depth of the game is revealed anyway interest in the proceedings increases proportionally to the number of familiar people in the team because only with them possible quality team play dota 2 loaf loaf anyone you choose as for the gameplay then we have good old bunker modified only visually from medieval graphics warcraft 3 left pixel and  characters look a lot more colorful than the first part pleasant texture pleasing to the eye each character has its own set of animations all the effects are traced in detail and spectacular often during a particularly massive battles replete with an abundance of picture paints at which you lose the essence of what is happening but overall graphics looks cool and is not satisfactory the same goes for the voice acting all characters engaging in activities unique voice give one of the harvested phrases the spirit of the games memorable soundtrack that valve recorded using a full orchestra also the developers involved in the game interesting chip passing in silence match climactic battle moments of heated disturbing music if we talk about very very small things that have changed the characteristics of certain abilities and artifacts a couple of characters renamed number of the latter incidentally is constantly increasing  valve regularly replenishes list missing characters from the first part and even threatens to create new heroes cancers to be boiled alive another nice feature of the new dota is a system of storing statistics all your defeat and victory shall be accounted for and matches are recorded so you can review your or someone elses game having studied the replay here you will find a very interesting camera mode allowing for the match as he went on the monitor who was playing fog of war mouse movement  a very useful feature for those who wish to master such heroes like mipo or puja dota 2 dying ogre  a sad spectacle valve also tried to create an advanced ranking system during the matches are levels that are nominally rated player skill opponents with whom you are dealing with will meet your performance that should ideally create balance in reality however some special factory new accounts in steam so start writing your stats from scratch or wait a low priority resulting from complaints yes the selection of the ideal community is held in the form of reportov which players throw each other as a result the cubs first infantrymen entered in the bunker meet experienced grandfathers ready without any hints to explain who is who so the problem autobalance not yet however this is by no means a disadvantage of the game reasons for this lie as they say somewhere in time and morals dota 2 forest farm  a relatively safe way to get hold of experience and gold dota 2 is a very strategy encouraging game but it can get a little bit competetive considering its a game where you are put on a team of 5 heroes including you and you have to try your best to destroy the other teams ancient like a nexus in league but there are towers and barracks blocking your way so the game is not at all about kills it takes a lot of strategy and tactics to win and on that note i do in fact recommend this game to any hardcore and just moba players in general

while it can take awhile to get the hang of this game as it has a steep learning curve it is extremely rewarding when it starts to click its a challenging game that is fun to play with friends its not always going to be sunshine and roses but it will keep you playing due to the variety of heroes and people that you will meet also what impresses me the most about this game is how balanced it is there is absolutely no way for someone to purchase an item with real money that will gain them an advantage in the game all of the items you can buy are purely cosmetic and the heroes are all quite balanced and can all be countered highly recommend this fun game dont be discouraged if it doesnt click right away itll get better

in january 1st 1989 the chinese government started a topsecret project at the requests of the inner chinese communist illuminati an offshoot of the original group and the red dragon triangle masons this was not the first project the two groups had attempted previous attempts include the chinese civil war and the great leap forward and both proved effective at wreaking havoc upon glorious cathay and not the world both groups decided that the new project was to be named dota or desolation orbital termination assesment the project was dedicated to the creation of a new chineserun weapon of mass destruction run by harvested peasant souls and refined with the angry souls of many crabby chinese ancestors millions of farmer peasants were conscripted and then sacrificed to quickly develop this orbital cannon of worldy destruction much like emperor qin and the great wall and after the cannon was secretly placed into orbit above china a crackteam of foreign computer experts and chinese mathematicians created a program that could quickly check the viability of humanity on earth if the program assessed hit negative on its tests the cannon would be fired and the earth would be destroyed and nothing but ashes and the screams of billions would remain an american spy gabriel newell discovered this operation and quickly sent word of it to anticommunist students and other misfits in china and used their protests as a smokescreen as he stole the program and detonator of the dota from a chinese agent named icefrog who was in the process of evacuating them after returning to his safehouse gabriel decided to desert america and in his moment of ambition created valve threatening all potential dangers away with his superweapon it has been decades since gabriel has established his now wellknown and allencompassing syndicate dota is still running assessing every report every text message every rapierfeed and every south american and russian dota has now been upgraded to its second and final form what chance do we insignificent insects have against this malevolent ai our chances of survival dwindle with every  madre and  blyat spat out by our degenerate brethren we can just sit here idly in the queue lobbies and mope and whine about no region lock while dota gains more negative information that brings it ever closer to pulverising this puny rock we call earth or we can charge forth mics and positive attitudes at the ready to rectify the failures of the abyss the sub1k mmr trench what will you do

defense of the ancients 2  known more colloquially as dota 2  is a masterpiece of modern video game design harkening back to the ageold starcraft 1 custom map aeon of strife dota 2 nearly perfects the elements introduce in that original mod the mechanics and gameplay are ageless simple in their implementation and flawless in their execution everything about dota 2 is a triumph of engineering  the individual heroes have fantastic character designs both thematically and mechanically and the game is perfectly balanced around its seemingly lack of scaling and at times stagnant nature it is a game where levels and planning take precedent over gold advantage and items and teamwork is a union  a celebration even  of independent player skill this variety of complex mechanics themes and interactions that coalesce into a truly unique experience i recall the time i forgot to ward bot rune and when mid lost illusion to a pudge from top lane i was only blamed four times as opposed to dozens in other similar competing games this unparalelled level of community benevolence and powerful inclination towards skillful play make dota 2 the best game on the market if not all of human history four hundred years from now when the paragon hyperscholars are uploading digiedu to the modbrains of the neo bourgeoisie dota 2 will forever be imbedded in the siliconcortex as the zenith of prehuman ingenuity 010 it sucks

dota 2 is one of the most exciting replayable and addictive competitive experiences around though theres a lot of learning youll need to do to get up to speed the payoff is a sophisticated complex teambased experience the required investment of time and energy combined with the meticulously designed gameplay produce a hugely satisfying sense of fulfillment when you win on the flip side it also means an all the more crushing sense of failure when you lose but its worth the risk

8 tablespoons 1 stick unsalted butter plus more for pan 5 tablespoons allpurpose flour plus more for pan 12 cup whole hazelnuts toasted 1 14 cups confectioners sugar plus more for dusting 1 pinch of salt 4 large egg whites 14 teaspoon pure vanilla extract directions step 1 heat oven to 325 degrees in a small saucepan melt butter until light amber in color step 2 brush madeleine pan with melted butter and dust lightly with flour place hazelnuts and 1 tablespoon confectioners sugar in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade and process until very fine step 3 combine hazelnut mixture 1 cup plus 3 tablespoons confectioners sugar flour and salt in a medium bowl add egg whites and vanilla and whisk to combine add melted browned butter and whisk until incorporated with a tablespoon fill molds evenly about 34 of the way transfer to oven and bake 14 to 18 minutes cool 2 minutes and remove from pan cool completely on a rack ridged side up dust cookies with confectioners sugar

dota 2 is the first moba game ive ever played and it is amazing i have a lot of games that i like to play but dota 2 tops the charts it is an easy to learn hard to master type of game just the type i like most ftp games i know have ingame purchases that are practically crucial to progress through the game thats not the case here dota 2 has ingame purchases but theyre not absolutely needed to play theyre just for fun one of my favorite parts of the game is that there is no end dota 2 isnt you made it past level 2 now go to level 3 you progress through the game by understanding and knowledge another huge plus is that it gives so many practice opportunities from the training mode helping you learn mechanics of the game like last hits to letting you practice your favorite heroes in bot matches lastly the heroes themselves all of them have their own twist one the game and their own backgrounds they have names that stick like outworld devourer and razor if they were just called mage or brute it would sound like it would just be another spellcasting strategic war game but this is no war game this is dota 2

recommended
dota 2 is the spiritual successor to the warcraft iii the frozen throne custom game defense of the ancients allstars in which the player controls a single hero unit in a battle to level up collect loot and destroy the enemys structures all within a typical 3045minute experience games can be longer or shorter but typically fall within that window as the metagame has changed due to content update patches games have grown shorter over the years but in the past dota was likened to world of warcraft in an hour it is an accurate analogy as the player experiences many traditional rpg elements while competing headtohead against other players dota 2 is an incredibly complex strategydriven competitive game with over 100 individual unique heroes from which to choose as well as a variety of different game modes to mix up the drafting process each game is an experience unto itself no two games will ever be identical the one thing standing in the way of most players new to the genre of mobas is the unforgiving nature of the game for better or worse each mistake a player makes can be critical in the final outcome of the game especially as the clock ticks on in a couple of seconds the entire tide of the game could swing heavily from one team to the others if even one costly mistake is made as a result of this many players have developed a rather distasteful attitude toward others when mistakes are made a word that is often thrown around is toxic which isnt inaccurate the toxicity of the community can be a terrible deterrent to new players and can actively inhibit growth of the game thankfully valve have implemented ways in which to curb these behaviors through punishments dished out to players with nasty attitudes each player is given a number of reports per week which can be issued against other players who have exhibited poor form rudeness excessive communication spam or other infractions and as a player accrues reports he or she may face a communication mute or a number of games in the low priority queue which is sort of like rehabilitation back into society while i have spent a lot of time talking about the negative aspects of the game i want to stress that i have been playing dota since 2004 and i dont see a stopping point in sight even yet i am consistently captivated by the dynamic and interesting nature of the game of each individual game to offer me a unique fun and rewarding tradeoff for my time commitment there are few feelings in gaming as satisfying and enjoyable as coming away from a game with a hardfought win against other players with good attitudes it makes the bad stuff seem trivial by comparison in addition to the actual gameplay elements explored in this review dota 2 is part of the greater steam trading community a collective of games featuring ingame economies and persistent item storage for players through the steam platform even if you dont particularly like the game itself item trading from playertoplayer can be tremendously rewarding and fun and if youre lucky you could find yourself with an item worth up to many thousands of dollars of course with any relatively free market there will be unsavory and dishonest individuals out there who will not blink an eye before attempting to scam you rip you off or otherwise take advantage of you thankfully there are plenty of resources available to new traders so do your research in fact if you need help dont be afraid to add me directly and fire away im always happy to help in conclusion dota and dota 2 are without a doubt the games on which i have spent the most time playing each new game brings me a new exciting experience and as long as you remind yourself to maintain a positive attitude and resist the urge to treat your fellow player with disrespect you will agree that it is among the best multiplayer experiences available anywhere learn it love it and play on
